summary:
I want to provide Austrian investors and developers the possibility to connect to a professional network of building engineering professionals in the Netherlands and for Dutch investors and developers the same in Austria. 

As an engineer in the European Union my vision is to learn and practice design solutions in different countries. I have a longterm professional experience and educational background in Austria where I was able to create a network from construction companies to architectural offices. Since two years I have gaines experience in the dutch market currently working as a BIM coordinator in the area of The Hague.


A wide range of experience with all different kind of buildings. energy efficient design, value engineering, value engineering, detailed engineering solutions, interface engineering, site management & supervision, scheduling, tender management, integrated design from the early design stages.

Personal strengths: good communication skills, analytical mindset, fast decision making, good in creating teams for different tasks, skills in negotiating with clients and contractors, Solution oriented working, ability to work under high demand, crisis management.

Working in a team is important for me, to share the strengths of the different characters who are involved. 

The various projects gave me good overview of what kind of systems are meeting the demands of
clients and investors today and to be still in the responsibility to give the advises as an engineer for
good quality, state of the art technology and sustainable design. At the same time I kept my 
academic way of thinking big and outside the box, to give a perspective for alternative solutions and 
to attract clients for investing into outstanding solutions.
An important experience is as well to act in the field with the clients, the engineering consultants of
the clients, as well as with the project audits to work together on the best solution of each building, 
to create a marvelous environment. 
All of that packed into the mindset of integrated and life cycle design.

projects.title: Schiphol Amsterdam New Terminal - Enabling works
projects.description: Part of the design team for the "Enabling Works" projects to prepare for the integration of the new Terminal building into the Schiphol Airport. Focussing on the solution finding for the relocation and adaption of the cabeling and pipe infrastructure. The challenge of the project was to deal with a huge stakeholder structure and to get to a common solution in a short period of time.

projects.title: MAHÜ 77 Wien – Refurbishment of the former „Generali-Center“, Vienna
projects.description:
client/investor: Redevco
location: Vienna/Austria
total project volume: € 12 Million
duration: December 2014 – December 2016

Refurbishment of a shopping mall from the 1970s. Replacement and optimization of the central plants for Air-conditioning, cooling and heating supply of the building.
Shell and Core conception and preparation for the clients of TK-Maxx, CCC and Spar.

Responsible for the HVAC design and construction supervision. (Cost volume appr. € 4 Million)
The whole design and construction process was based and executed with Building Information Modelling software.

Design stages for HVAC and special equipment:
-basic evaluation
-preliminary design
-license planning
-detailed engineering and execution planning
-interfaces with architecture 
-tendering and contracting 
-site supervision 

Special characteristics: BREEAM certification, contaminant building structures.

projects.title: BMW Dingolfing und Steyr Betriebsküchen
projects.description:
client/investor: BMW Group
locations: Dingolfing/Bavaria/Germany and Steyr/Upper Austria/Austria
total project volume: € 16 Million
duration: December 2014 – December 2015

Responsible for the HVAC design and construction supervision. (Cost volume appr. € 4 Million)
The whole design and construction process was based and executed with Building Information Modelling.

Demolition and Revitalization of the main canteen kitchens at the production sites in Dingolfing, Germany and Steyr, Austria.
Design and execution of an interim solution for the cantina supply.
Design stages for HVAC and special equipment:
-basic evaluation
-preliminary design
-license planning
-detailed engineering and execution planning
-interfaces with architecture 
-tendering and contracting 
-site supervision 
Special characteristics: Design and execution without disturbing the fully automatic car production.
Special characteristics: complexity of client decision structure

projects.title: Infineon Villach Gebäudeverbund 17
projects.description:
client/investor: Infineon Technologies AG
location: Villach/Carinthia/Austria
total project volume: € 40 Million
duration: October 2014 – December 2015

scale of work: office building manufacturing plant (fully automatic production, part of the concept Industry 4.0 of Infineon) extension of the Infineon headquarters in Carinthia/Austria.
Responsible for the HVAC design and construction supervision together with one project partner (Cost volume appr. € 10 Million).
The whole design and construction process was based and executed with Building Information Modelling software.

Design stages for HVAC and special equipment:
-basic evaluation
-preliminary design
-license planning
-detailed engineering and execution planning
-interfaces with architecture 
-tendering and contracting 
-site supervision 
Special characteristics: Clean-Room technology, Interface-Matrix with the units for the production of semiconductors, special gas supply and special exhaust systems. 
Challenges: solving interface problems, solving BMS problems (shut down of the whole production process)

projects.title: Krankenhaus Berlin Mitte der Charite
projects.description:
client/investor: Charite
location: Berlin/Germany
project volume: € 250 Million

Scale of work: 
Refurbishment of a high-rise patient accomodation building and the construction of the surgical building.
Special characteristics: Hygiene standards, Surgery rooms (HEPA Filters and laminar flow systems)
Analysis of the tender-documents and contract. Calculation for the construction offer, responsibility for the HVAC, BMS, Fire safety and electrical part.
Involved in the decision-making process for the plausibility of continuing the tender process for that project.
After the total number of three negotiations with the client the result was a refusal from the project in terms of the time schedule and feasibility under the concern of an efficient and the economic point of view, as well as the concept and lineup of the client.

profile_positions.description: Ontwerp van VO t/m TO fase. Building Information Modelling.
profile_positions.title: BIM Coordinator / Design Engineer HVAC

profile_positions.description: My fiance and me started a project riding two motorcycles from the North Cape in Norway all the way down via the east coast of Africa to the Cape Aghulas in South Africa. We set up a partnership with several companies, including Suzuki, Klim and Enduristan to tackle this journey. Alongside we were filming, photographing and writing about our experiences and adventures and published our work on the Adventurism Youtube-channel and our own website adventurism.tv. Join us to learn more: www.adventurism.tv / Instagram: Tschojoe / Youtube: Adventurism Nora
profile_positions.title: Producer / Videographer / Photographer / Writer / Adventurer

profile_positions.description: Building Installations, Design Engineer, Project Leader
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer HVAC

profile_positions.description:
The trip with the motorcycle from Austria to Indonesia was a 
challenge where I learned to find my way through different cultures, being without any infrastructure 
and support from a network or social environment, keeping it simple and even to be able to solve 
certain tasks in remote areas. All this was followed by getting to know great and helpful people, 
making new friends, experiencing breathtaking moments and to see what the world is all about and 
what people think, how beautiful our world is. It was a great experience and it resulted in creating a 
mindset for meeting challenges, finding ideas, being creative and to stay positive,
able to learn and adapt in different situations within different cultures and environments.
profile_positions.title: Rideyourownstory - a motorcycle adventure

profile_positions.description:
Employee, contributor for the Phases 1 to 8 according to the HOAI guidelines.
Implementation of BIM Software for Design Solutions and Costumer Documentation
Engineering and Project Management Competence for Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning, Cooling, Plumbing and Sanitary Systems, Fire Detection/Safety and Building Management Systems.
- Responsible for the implementation of National Standards for Austria and Germany.
- Implementation and execution European Union Standards.
- Design Interfaces to meet optimized architecture for energy efficiency.
- Regular contributor for BREEAM Certification.
- Due diligence evaluations and reports.
profile_positions.title: Team Engineer HVAC/Fire Safety/BMS

Project contributor for cost estimation and calculation, tender, contracting, project acquisitions.

Fulltime 2008-2010; Part-time 2010-2012 during my University studies.

Project management in the design and tender stage.
Energy contracting and consumption calculation for PPP-projects.
